id: Masterclass: Use Notion Like A Pro. Smart Habit Tracker.
name: Masterclass: Use Notion Like A Pro. Smart Habit Tracker.
description: Mastering Notion databases will help you get to new incredible horizons of structuring and organizing your life.In this course, you will have a chance to master the top Notion features for building usable and capacious dashboards:DatabasesFormulasRelationsRollupsThis class is not only about theory. You are supposed to be an active learner.
